title: Continuous Learning
description: So, are you one of those people who doesn’t like to study? Hate diving into books? Learning is a fundamental part of our lives. In this post, I’m discussing a few things you should know about learning...

title: Syndrome of Rush
description:
SThis is a brief insight about the rush and how we waste time trying to achieve more in less time.
Is this truly an essential quality in our society?

title: Future Expectations about the World
description: This is a small thought about future of our world in terms of ourselves.

title: Create a glossary of Terms
description: In this post, i'll talk about a way to create a glossary of terms using python and nltk. Keep in mind that since im from Brazil, im building a glossary in portuguese, but the means to build one could be used to build a glossary in any other language.

title: 10 python packages you cant live without
description: As a Python developer, you should at least know that these libraries exist. If you’re already using them, thumbs up to you!

title: Review : Human Compatible by Stuart Russell
description: Review of the new book written by one of the most well known personalities in the AI field.

title: Review : A.I. a Guide for Thinking Humans by Melanie Mitchell
description: Review of the new book written by Melanie Mitchell, prof. of computer science at Portland State University and also received her PhD from Douglas Hofstadter the famous author of the book Gödel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid.

title: Review: Protein Structure Prediction
description: Protein Structure Prediction is another biggest challenge that mankind is looking to solve. If solved or at least partially solved it could revolutionize medicine and drug industry.

title: Path to become a AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Some cool resources to prepare for AWS Basic Certification.

title: ChatGPT: Can AI become a storyteller?
description: ChatGPT is the new kid on the block ... But, would ChatGPT be able to became a storyteller?

title: ChatGPT + MidJourney: Creating a story
description:
This is a follow up post about ChatGPT, but this time, instead of generating the images of our characters using DALL-E I went on Midjourney v4 for that.
It's amazing!

title: Generative AI and the Near Future Humanity
description: This year is coming to an end (2023 if you're reading this in the future), and ahead lots of questions raised this year about generative AI will resonate over the tech industry.

title: Harnessing Decision Trees for Efficient Learning
description:
This is a follow up post about ChatGPT, but this time, instead of generating the images of our characters using DALL-E I went on Midjourney v4 for that.
It's amazing!

title: Does AI generate art?
description: Much has been discussed about AI and art. But, can AI really generate art?

title: Python Expert Path
description: A simple, but hopefully useful guide to become a Python expert.

title: Os 12 Mandamentos da Sagrada #bolhaDev
description:
Eis aqui os 12 mandamentos da sagrada #bolhaDev. Ao longo dos anos muito foi sendo discutido, principalmente, no Twitter o que era bom ou ruim dentro da bolha de desenvolvimento.
Esse é apenas um apanhado de 12 principais pontos que sempre foram colocados como pau de conversa e discórdia.

title: Self-Organizing Map (Kohonen Map)
description: An unsupervised machine learning algorithm based on the premise that neurons closer to the data in a high-dimensional space can be represented as a 2D mapping surface.

title: Check-in list for your Code Review
description:
Checklist of what I think is important during a code review (given you might be a reviewer or a submitter).
Hopefully this checklist will help you in remember some minimal requirements to check.

title: Creating a simple string Search
description: In this post, I'll explore how to create a simple string search by discussing a few different algorithms and libraries that can be used to implement it.

title: BlueSky: Writing a Bot using ATProtocol
description: Let's explore a little bit the ATProtocol and how to create a simple bot using it.

title: What to Expect in 2025: My Take on some Tech Trends
description: This is my take on what to expect for 2025. Keep in mind that this is my personal opinion and it's based on possibilities and trends that I've been following.

title: Tries: Creating a simple string Search
description: Previously, I presented several ways to create a simple string search using different algorithms. In this post, I'll explore the same concept, this time using Tries.

title: Writing Simple Code
description: How can you write simple code? In this post, I explore a bit about the learning curve shown in an anecdotal graph I came across on the internet.

title: Review: Learning Functional Programming
description: This is my review of the book Learning Functional Programming by Jack Widman, that was released in august 2022. The idea here is also to discuss a little bit more about functional programming covering topics like currying, partial application, and others.
